ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Resampling procedures to assess the stability of selected variables with additional finite sample error control for high-dimensional variable selection procedures such as Lasso or boosting. Both, standard stability selection (Meinshausen & Buhlmann, 2010, <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2010.00740.x>)  and complementary pairs stability selection with improved error bounds  (Shah & Samworth, 2013, <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2011.01034.x>) are implemented. The package can be combined with arbitrary user specified variable selection approaches.

Resampling procedures to assess the stability of selected variables with additional finite sample error control for high-dimensional variable selection procedures such as Lasso or boosting. Both, standard stability selection (Meinshausen & Buhlmann, 2010, <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2010.00740.x>)  and complementary pairs stability selection with improved error bounds  (Shah & Samworth, 2013, <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2011.01034.x>) are implemented. The package can be combined with arbitrary user specified variable selection approaches.

name: r-stabs
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.7-1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-stabs
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/stabs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/stabs/stabs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8243bc10a95aba15ce6e33edbf34f8806015e52609f8a2f1cde1159e49f0e16b

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('stabs')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('stabs')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/hofnerb/stabs
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Resampling procedures to assess the stability of selected variables with additional finite sample error control for high-dimensional variable selection procedures such as Lasso or boosting. Both, standard stability selection (Meinshausen & Buhlmann, 2010, <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2010.00740.x>)  and 
    complementary pairs stability selection with improved error bounds  (Shah & Samworth, 2013, <doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2011.01034.x>) are implemented. The package can be combined with arbitrary user specified variable selection approaches.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
